mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user(userid, userpw, username, email, address, gender, nickname, age, u_point, u_pic) values(#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{email}, #{address}, #{gender}, #{nickname}, #{age}, 100, #{u_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select userid from tbl_user where userid = #{userid}
select count(*) from tbl_user where email = #{email}
select u_pic from tbl_user where userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update tbl_user set userpw = #{userpw, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username}, email = #{email}, nickname = #{nickname}, age = #{age}, u_pic = #{u_pic, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where userid = #{userid}
